text: St. Stephan School is not only known for its excellent academic programs but also for the exceptional behavior of its students. The students here are polite, respectful, and genuinely supportive of one another, reflecting the school’s values of integrity and empathy. They actively participate in school initiatives and consistently demonstrate a strong work ethic, whether in academics, sports, or community service. The school’s emphasis on character development shines through in its students, who are thoughtful, disciplined, and motivated to make a positive difference. It’s inspiring to see young people embody such positive qualities, and it’s clear that St. Stephan School nurtures a culture of kindness, responsibility, and community involvement. This school is an excellent choice for any family looking to ensure their child is part of a respectful and driven student body.
I graduated in the class of 6h last year in 2024, now I'm in st patricks and I miss the school alot, it was so sigma and my teacher mr wu was the W science teacher, best school ever!

A decision I dont regret.. the teachers are responsive and kind. the school actually handled bullying cases quite well and dont brush u off lightly (speaking with real experience). let the boys developed their own independent,  confidence and  character building.

they must be doing something good that they had been churning out leaders and confident young men....
I have never heard of this school before. Then I saw the behaviour of its students. Well mannered and well behaved. Not a single swear word spoken

I was a graduate of this school in 2023 and I must say that the experience of primary 1 to 6 was very good and my love of books started here though the toilets are a bit old and they only renovated the first floor I’m not sure about now though
